name: Color TV-Game 15

name: Color TV-Game Racing 112

The game later made a cameo appearance in the game WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Microgame$ for the Game Boy Advance. Shigeru Miyamoto worked on this game's casing and included the stick shift.

name: Color TV-Game Block Kuzushi
description:
Color TV-Game Block Kuzushi is a Color TV Game title released in 1979 only in Japan. The first home console game to be created exclusively by Nintendo (the other Color TV Games were created with the assistance of Mitsubishi), Block Kuzushi is also known as being designed by legendary game developer Shigeru Miyamoto. Block Kuzushi is basically a home console version of Breakout. Block Kuzushi sold over 400,000 units in Japan, quite the success for Nintendo.

Several things made Color TV-Game Block Kuzushi slightly unique when compared to other block-breaking games at the time. The player could choose from several different options, such as the number of balls present during a game and the speed of the ball/balls.

Different game modes were present, such as Block Lighter, in which the player must destroy blinking blocks, and Block Through, which would have the ball eliminating every block in its way up to the top (without destroying a block and heading downwards).

In department stores, managers would hold Block Kuzushi competitions with the winner obtaining a special medal to confirm their expertise in the game.

name: Computer TV Game
description: Computer TV Game is a remake of Nintendo's arcade game titled Computer Othello. The game has both single and multiplayer modes. Computer TV Game was the last of the five Color TV Game systems released. It was released in 1980 exclusively in Japan.

Meteor Mess 3D is a remake of the graphic adventure game, Maniac Mansion. It's a fan project and a homage to a game that has a special place in our lives.

This version contains new rooms, objects and puzzles and even a completely new way to solve the game.

Many versions were released following the first version which was released in June 1984. Version 3 included games that were based on previous Nintendo titles.

Babies bring joy, but also challenges. Colonists’ hearts will melt when the baby coos and giggles in their arms. But it takes effort to keep a baby happy and healthy and loved - create a safe haven for them in a cozy pastel nursery where there is always warm milk, a comfortable crib, overflowing toy chests and kind caregivers.

name: The Grown-Up Detective Agency
description:
The only thing Bell Park likes more than a mystery is solving it on her own. But when a time-travelling 12-year-old version of herself lands face-down on her rented co-working desk, she'll have no choice but to take the displaced kid detective along on her latest case.
Follow the trail of a missing heterosexual on the strange streets of Toronto! Investigate a quirky cast of drag kings, chicken wing enthusiasts, and women in elaborate cat make-up! Thrill in the pervasive ennui of your early twenties! Struggle to remember where your preteen self was at with the whole being gay thing!
Will Adult Bell make peace with the figurative and literal ghosts of her past? Can Kid Bell navigate the uncanny world of the 2020s and find her way back home? How's the chicken in that creepy basement food court? These questions and more will be answered in THE GROWN-UP DETECTIVE AGENCY.

name: The Room

Occult...Do you believe in it?

Would you sacrifice someone to prolong your life?

The story of 'The Room' follows our occult loving protagonist who gets an apartment for a very cheap price.
For the first few days everything seemed fine, but then weird things start happening when some special conditions are met.

What are these conditions?

What exactly is happening in the apartment?

description: Shiseido Beauty Solution Kaihatsu Center Kanshuu: Project Beauty is a game developed and published by Sega for the Nintendo DS released only in Japan.

name: Last Chance Market
description: When a grocery list becomes a struggle to survive against cosmic horrors, will you make it through the door? Stay alive, solve the mystery and make your offerings - or end up on a missing person poster in this first-person, non-linear nightmare. But you'd better hurry, the store's closing soon.

name: Last Stand
description: Last Stand is a tactical defense game where you must defend humanity against the undead zombie horde. Construct your army’s defenses by building walls, turrets and towers. Thin the zombie horde with explosives devices such as land mines, bazookas and air strikes. Upgrade your squads skills and arm them with powerful weapons and armor.

name: Legends of Amberland II: The Song of Trees
description: Legends of Amberland II: The Song of Trees is a classic western RPG inspired by great 90s era games such as Might & Magic, Wizardry, Ultima, the Gold Box series. Light, fairy tale, epic, heroic, slightly humorous adventure.

name: Let Me Out
description: John, a 30-year-old detective experiences paranormal occurrences while investigating an abandoned house trying to find information on missing persons.

name: Let's Seduce the Heroine!
description: A girl is reincarnated into the villainess of an otome game. In order to avoid her scripted demise, she realizes she has to seduce the heroine! A yuri visual novel with a twist.

name: Light
description: A 2D Lighting Speed Collision Based Fighting Game.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium I
description: This is a role-playing game, the game adopts the expression of dynamic comics. You can play the game by dragging similar to the comics.

name: Magic Kingdom War DLC-1
description: Thomson Skill: Cool Down Deals 1.75 times the damage to all enemies and reduces the rage of all enemies by 5.

name: Magic Kingdom War DLC-2
description: Farquhar Skill: Eliminate Deal 1.5 times damage to a single enemy. If the enemy's HP is lower than 30%, kill it directly.

name: Noesis
description: From behind the incidents, there hide the secret of the past.

name: Numbers & Letters
description: Numbers and Letters Practice mathematics and solve equations in virtual reality using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Improve your literacy skills and become better at spelling. Complete the word by finding the missing letter. Earn achievements and rank on leader boards.

name: Operator
description: OPERATOR is a game about escape, self destruction, manipulation of the world and overcoming a manufactured inhuman foe. The player makes their way across the strange architecture of Installation Jade, changing it as they go, attempting to escape the grasp of the Director. Can you?

name: Order of Battle: Allies Victorious
description: Allies Victorious is the last part of the Allied trilogy for Order of Battle. The new DLC depicts battles from the Allied Normandy landings in summer 1944 to the end of the war in Europe.

name: Oscar Wilde Card
description: He loves dinner parties. He loathes you. An amusing card game.

name: Out of the Woods
description: Out of the Woods is a forest survival simulation with elements of realism. We will face an extremely serious and dangerous adversary - nature itself and its boundless forces. However, the pocket encyclopedia and your ingenuity will help to cope with all the difficulties and get out of the forest

name: Outranked
description: Take up quick battles against your friends in groups of 4 up to 20 people, in this sometimes chaotic but very strategic team-versus-team capture-the-flag game. In Outranked, each player gets one of their team's ranks, to capture the opposing team's flag and bring it back to their own team's base.

name: Over-Run
description: A modern twist of a Zombie Round Base Multiplayer Game, can you survive

name: Paint Royale
description: Paint Royale is a Paintball Co-op shooter in which you can play with your friends in many different game modes and maps, the game modes include the most famous game modes such as Battle Royale, but also completely new game directions.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1944
description: The war on the Eastern Front has reached fever pitch. Wehrmacht forces across the Eastern Front find themselves under immense pressure from a resurgent Red Army.

name: Paperback Adventures
description: Combine word wizardry and superior strategy in this roguelike deckbuilding adventure. Craft a unique deck of letter cards throughout each journey, collect rewards from your victories, and each adventure unlocks new cards.

name: Paranormal Observation
description: Start your career as a ghost hunter with the latest technology. Use your computer to find out what type of ghost you are dealing with. Are you prepared to face the challenges of ghost hunting?

name: Party Quest
description: Party Quest is a 2D MMO platformer chalked full of mini games (Party Quests), secrets, and more! Each unique Party Quest that you find and unlock will challenge you and your fellow party members to accomplish various tasks in a set time limit.

name: Mobile Hangman
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Casual
description: Space adventure game that combines modern and different concepts with the games we played in the past.

name: Revengers
description: CO-OP Openworld FPS set in a fictional Khiribi island located in beautiful environment of the Carribean sea run by warlord Dalian. Explore the environment, fight his bloodthirsty mercenaries, liberate outposts and learn some ancient powers that will help you to bring justice and glory to this land!

name: The Lord of the Parties x Amane Momo
description: “Amane Momo”, a Vtuber who likes playing video games,singing, and eating delicious food has joined The Lord of the Parties!

name: Wok Planet
description: The great confrontation between two civilizations!

name: Near Sol
description: Space 4X game with the ability to build factories, extract resources, with characters, internal and external markets ... Take part in the discussion of the game, share your vision.

name: Robot Rejects
description: Saw-slicing, metal-melting, steel-on-steel robot destruction! In this robot battle arena game, create and customize your own fighting robot and pit it against rival bots in an online multiplayer battle arena!

name: Wrangel Island
description: A survival game set in the Ice Age where man and animal collide, work together with others or attempt to survive alone in these frozen lands.

name: Rose City Revenge: The Beginning
description: Jane's father is seriously injured during an attack. With crime out of control and realizing that nothing will be done, Jane decides to track down the criminals. This will result in going through the criminal underworld in Rose City and taking down bosses one by one along the way.

name: X-Racing
description: Upgrade your car, ram your opponents, decide things, step on the gas, play without rules, become the king of roads and streets!

name: Within the Backrooms
description: You don't know how you got here, and you don't know how you'll leave. Wander the depths of the Backrooms in hopes of finding something more.

name: Citri Plays Noirwood
description: Citri Plays Noirwood is a short game where you play as a vtuber who is playing a horror game. Search for the 7 relics and avoid the monster in Noirwood, while increasing your viewers by keeping chat entertained as you play!

name: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Asia
description: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Asia is a free DLC that you can activate through your Steam Client. It will give you the default Asia Scenery.

name: NecroNomNomNom: Eldritch Horror Dating
description: Plunge into the depths of sanity and Lovecraftian lore in this Eldritch Horror Dating Visual Novel. Will you find love or madness?

name: Moon Split Island: Dungeon Adventure
description: Moon Split Island is an open-world adventure. Alone or in a company, explore the island, climb steep slopes, and explore deep canyons. Find mysterious treasures and discover passages to the underworld.

name: What's Your Emergency
description: What's your emergency is a game where you take the boots of a 911 operator. In it you will be presented with different emergencys, your task is aid the victims. You will be able to do this through dialogs with the victim and using the new computer application called "Emergency_Manager_2.0".

name: Wild Isles
description: Wild Isles is a relaxing first person, nature walking simulator. Each Island is procedurally generated, and full of tranquil forests, stunning vistas, spectacular sunsets, and peaceful ocean waves. Lose yourself in the beauty and sounds of nature, explore the island and collect flowers.

name: World War Battle Simulator
description: WWBS is a strategy game where you can assume first-person control over any unit fighting on the field of battle. Apply the right strategy to different maps and directly support your troops on the frontlines!

name: Void Titan
description: A unique side scroller with roguelike elements, collect and craft in order to stop giant, terraforming machines that consume the world behind you.

name: Monster Maker
description: This is a Xiuxian style role-playing game! In the game, build caves, capture spirit animals, and plant miraculous drugs. 360 degree lockless combat mode, even when flying in the sky, you can wave your long sleeve to move mountains and reclaim the sea.

name: Street Boy
description: Travel across Jamaica's beautiful Portland parish by foot or handcart! Help Arlinton find his calling and save his community from troublesome thugs.

name: Bedtime Horror Stories
description: Late night. A young man called Sam is home alone. He finds a mystical book that takes him into a world of horror stories that come alive. Start reading, but you must not break the most important rule. Once you have started the book, you must finish it!

name: Zombie Slapper
description: Zombie Slapper is a Wave-Based Zombie Survival where the goal is to survive as many waves as possible. You have super human slapping abilities and can send zombies flying with your hand cannon. As you progress through rounds, you can improve your characters stats and unlock new attacks and abilities. You have powerful ultimates that can be used to wipe out hordes of zombies and there are various power-ups around the map to give you an edge. Zombies get faster and more powerful as rounds increase and harder enemies will spawn as you progress. How many rounds can you survive?

name: Pogo Rage: The Awakening
description: A True Trial For Brave Masochists.

name: Police Transporter Simulator
description: Now it's all up to you how quiet the city will be...

name: Pop Journey
description: Pop Journey is a leisure game that lets you relax. You will ride the train with Meidu to the distance. The journey is long. You can enjoy the scenery outside the window and find the happiness in the journey together.

name: Primal Roar: Jurassic Dinosaur Era
description: Primal Roar - Jurassic Dinosaur Era it's a Single Player VR game that takes you into the Jurassic age! Meet the most popular dinosaurs and learn amazing facts about them. Take a part in a dinosaur hunt and feel a PRIMAL ROAR.

name: Prince Akazaka x Princess
description: Prince Akihiko from modern kingdom Akazaka alongside with his wife, princess Aechara from modern kingdom Andong got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince Akihiko and Princess Aechara decided to save all princesses.

name: Protect Harem City
description: Protect Harem City is a strategy tower defense game where you are the tower that will protect the city! Arm yourself with lots of weapons and skills and be ready to be the defender of Harem. Are you ready to appease everyone's lust?

name: Prison Architect: Free for life
description: It’s time for some improvements, Warden! Make good use of new updates, fixes, and additional content to maximize your prison quality and your guards' performance. This is the Free for life update, and you guessed it: it’s free!

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2023
description: Pro Basketball Manager 2023 features more than 160 basketball competitions with the most depth and authenticity ever found in a basketball management game.

name: Project 44: Enlightenment
description: p44: Enlightenment the Boy somehow gets free with a little help of the light... his new best friend and saviour. Can he escape the orphanage and find out the truth?

name: Project: Dream
description: A Side-Scrolling fighter set within the future. Fight your way through a small, yet growing, roster of hero's and defeat your opponents!

name: Project Luna
description: This is a game about exploration and discovery Project Luna uses science heavily to a point where you can sell elements on the elemental market at certain stations and outposts.

name: Project Malice
description: An isometric roguelike third-person shooter about a ruined Earth and the unending chaos engulfing it. Fight hordes of the infected, gather loot, make allies, traverse spacetime, and venture into the depths of what we could've prevented.

name: Project R
description: You will have to infiltrate your way through the security cameras and scan every possible hint, in order to find out about his obscure activities. Night after night you will have to observe the increasingly bizarre and terrifying events.

name: Protorunner
description: Short and sweet 3D parkour game. Run, jump, climb and wall run in a minimalist world and get in the flow with satisfying mechanics. Prove your skills in varied challenges and try to finish them as fast as you can.

name: The Future Radio and the Artificial Pigeons
description: 2061, Japan. Mankind has lost the sky, and with it, its connections. All of it was taken away by birds... ...By countless artificial pigeons flying through the sky.

name: RichMan 11
description: Richman 11 is a casual game in Monopoly genre, it is the 11th episode of the franchise. In the game, players could select maps, characters and group play, creating free play or challenge play. Try to earn money and win the play by investing properties, using cards, etc.

name: Slender Myth
description: After years of being dormant the myth is put to the test and unfortunately it is true. Explore the forest, piece together the past of this cursed place and put the myth to rest once and for all. This task won't be easy as you are not the only one within the forest. Based on character by Eric Knudsen

name: Slink & Snatch: Tales of Thievery
description: Unleash your inner thief in this VR stealth collectathon. As Slink, sneak, grapple and glide to explore every nook and cranny of a mysterious town in search of an arcane secret - and other people’s treasure, of course. All with the help from Snatch, your demon-grappling-gauntlet.

name: Smash Hyper Drive
description: It's 2025 and the country's mega research facility has gone bad. You are a lowly security guard gunning for his paycheck. Fight your way out in this twin-stick shooter. Reminiscent of Smash TV and the likes of Xeno Crisis.

name: Space Voyage: The Puzzle Game
description: Space Voyage is a puzzle game that doubles as a cinematic experience. Click and drag the given items, tools and teleporters to plan a perfect path for your spaceship to safely reach the end portal. Over 100 levels, colorblind assistance, no reading ability needed.

name: Spinner Invaders 2: A Mad Revenge
description: Shoot your way through a thrilling action adventure of 120 waves in 4 different game modes while fighting against waves of enemies and 12 extreme bosses. Save the world from a new mystery threat by yourself or with a friend locally and play 10 different Challenges.

name: Spin Quest: A Slot Adventure
description: Experience a unique mix of RPG and slot games!

name: Street volleyball: Invitation
description: Play volleyball matches with different players from different regions. Use you ability and find a way to defeat the opponent. Only with skill and quick reflexes can you beat them and become a champion.

name: The Asafo Journey
description: Become Asafo in this action adventure platformer. Chaos is corrupting the lands of the Nile valley and it's up to you to restore the balance. Run, jump and fight your way to the hidden enemy.

name: The Good Chicken
description: Chickens fighting chickens, in 2D! Chicken based PvP platform combat.

name: The Henchmen
description: The Henchmen is a pulp-inspired, 90s fueled top-down, action retro open-world game set in the fictional city of New Queens during 1979 and 1991.

name: The Hotel
description: The Hotel is an "old style" survival horror game!! Fight zombies and solve puzzle to try to escape!!

name: My Agent is a Futanari
description: An aspiring actor down on his luck, you visit your casting agent in person to implore her for work--"anything".

name: My Giant Friend
description: A short visual novel about a girl who meets a giant woman in order to grow. Grow, Grow, Grow until no men are able to disrespect her. Contains comedy.

name: Needy Dragons
description: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 dragon-girls, comedy, and plenty of sex!

name: Molytropia: Cloud in Shape of Hurt
description: The first of seven chapters, which will tell an amazing story about the adventures of a girl and her friends. Colorful landscapes and warm sunny atmosphere. Also, they will find the real door! And take part in the contest! Can you imagine?

name: Monocity
description: Monocity is a multiplayer real estate board game. In each round: All players roll the dice together and move. The player who bids the highest price gets the land. Collect resources, build buildings, upgrade them, increase population, use cards, trade with players, and more.

name: Moto Pizza Courier
description: “Hello, I would like to buy 2 large pizzas with extra cheese.” Does that sound familiar? Now, imagine that you receive calls like this.

name: Munchkin Digital
description: Kill the monsters & grab the loot in the classic card game!

name: My Insect Girl Can't Be This Cute
description: Warm soft skin, contrasted with hard chitin. It isn't something you've thought of until one day where your curiosity forced an encounter with an actual insect girl! In this visual novel, you meet Ophelia, the result of a successful cross genetics experiment between a ghost mantis and a human

name: Prototype
description: PtAP have chosen you to be the new test prototype! What does it mean, you wonder? We will force you to fight against robots and other Prototypes like you, with Power-ups and Paintballs.

name: Repit 2
description: The new Repit has become more interesting and less logical, the new (old redesigned) levels are more focused on interesting and unexpected passing

name: Retro Drive
description: Follow the journey of a college kid, who always seems to get left behind. He recently got held back after class, but his friends are already out party'n! This is no way for you to spend your best years, and you drive with the sheer determination to catch up with them.

name: RetroRange
description: A casual retro cyberpunk sandbox first-person shooter with object destructive physics.

name: Slaves
description: A man who dies in an accident gets reincarnated into a parallel world to fight evil!

name: The Hunt
description: Challenge your reflexes in this high speed high action combat racing game. Hunt wanted war criminals, raid automated mining facilities, race other head-hunters & scavenge for scraps to upgrade your hunter-craft & reach new racing tracks in the decaying remains of a once glorious civilization.

name: The King of Dice
description: A unique Richman-like multiplayer turn-based competitive game. In the game you have to roll dice to move around the map and use dice to gain different skills to beat other people.

name: The Legend of Young
description: Immortal Survivors is an independent rougelite ancient style game. Players can choose different teammates to form a special combat team and continuously upgrade and evolve in the battle with monsters to create their own model. Currently in the EA test, QQ group: 871333851

name: The Life of Arthur
description: The Life of Arthur is a story-based game with philosophical themes. No combat. Some puzzle-solving. Philosophical choices. For those interested in philosophical ideas, especially the philosophy of Arthur Schopenhauer.

name: The Longest Path
description: The Longest Path is a casual exploration and mini game filled world with procedurally generated biomes and real-world influenced locations. A casual metaverse like game with various play styles. The Longest Path is what you choose it to be!

name: The Myriad
description: Welcome to my Labyrinth! I call it the "Myriad." While it's not full of traps, monsters, shifting hedges, or teleporting goblets, it is quite large....256 meters squared to be exact, and aside from a few artifacts and other collectables, it's all maze..

name: The Ocean Will Have Us All
description: The Ocean Will Have Us All is a first person exploration game.Experience a day in the subatomic life of Moira Leech. Get up, go to work, go home, go back to sleep. Or. Go off the the beaten track! Take charge! Stick your finger in an electrical socket!

name: The Reaper Saga
description: Welcome to The Reaper Saga, you will have to investigate the disappearance of people and fight monsters, along the way to become stronger!

name: Timepunk
description: Stuck in the past with a portal gun? Rock some dinosaurs, collect their matter, travel forth in time, kick some knightly ass in the medieval times, decide if you want to prevent or cause World War II, and blast your way back to get to the Society of Time in this crazy bullet hell roguelike!

name: Tivick'ing! Chronicles
description: Tivick'ing! Chronicles is a fantasy RPG set on the continent of Arcadia. Play as the prince of a kingdom as he tries to unravel the mystery of the dark disturbances appearing across the continent, and their possible connection to his missing sister.

name: Tokki
description: Fun, casual platformer game with beautiful 1 bit pixel art, nice sharp controls and challenging levels.

name: Tokyo Stranger
description: Tokyo Stranger is an aerial genre of text horror game inspired by the opening ceremony of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games. You play as a tourist from an exotic country, looking for any possibility to escape Tokyo in a static world.

name: Slashers: Great Circus
description: Extension of the original map "Little circus" with a greater amplitude, difficulty and proportions.

name: Slam and Roll
description: Slam And Roll is true tribute to the frantic platform arcades games of the 90s, where intense gameplay and fast action are kings. Grab your stick, baseball bat, or best sports companion, solo or with a friend, and face off against the evil alien and their machines and save the world's best places.

name: Sky Puzzle
description: Sky Puzzle is a real-time turn-based card strategy game. You will meet all kinds of women, and through the test of courage and wisdom, you will further draw closer to each other. Of course, they are not ordinary girls.

name: Robospierre
description: Adventure yourself and solve puzzles in this challenging sokoban with Robospierre and his bird! This journey is filled with several twists in the classical sokoban gameplay, continuosly renewing the experience and complementing the hand drawn graphics in an immersive story.

name: Ronin's Run
description: A 3D side-scrolling Beat ‘em up set in Feudal Japan inspired by classic arcade games and samurai films. As rōnin Sen Takashi you have to avenge the death of your master killed during a raid on your quiet farming village.

name: Rite of Titans
description: Rite of Titans is a Free to Play hero-centric 3v3 action game - currently in the alpha stage. Master the moves and outplay your rivals in an epic, fast-paced hybrid of arcade sports and ability-based competition. See you in the arena!

name: Rising Star: The Horse Game
description: Rising a Star is a relaxing horse care simulator game with immersive horsemanship tasks and management features. Your grandpa owns a stable which was the place one of the most important equestrian academies of Tuscany. But now you're old enough to take care of it.

name: Rikki Kuu
description: Design & pilot combat drones among the remains of a broken moon battered in an asteroid field. Rikki Kuu is a third-person, physics-based 6DOF-style vehicular combat game set in a destructible, procedurally-generated environment.

name: Rhythm Any Music
description: Play using your own music and get into the rhythm with amazing backgrounds that are automatically generated by your music.

name: Rezzil Player
description: Rezzil Player is an ever-growing collection of sports training games that will improve your performance and reaction times across a wide range of sports. Designed to be used by anyone who strives to win, whether that’s in the local park against your friends or on the field in front of the world.

name: Necroffense
description: This is a game in which you use necromancy to control your soldiers and defeat enemy armies. Choose one of the random options to strengthen your troops. Push back the onrushing enemy army and destroy them!

name: Train Sim World 3: Dispolok BR 182 Add-On
description: Dispolok delivering duties await – climb aboard the sleek and stylish EuroSprinter dressed in iconic yellow accents, ready for service on nightly fast freight trains with Train Sim World 3: Dispolok BR 182!

name: Train Sim World 3: Rail Head Treatment Train Add-On
description: Water tanks full, 2 locomotives raring to go, it’s Autumn and the tracks need a good blasting - power wash your way to success with the Train Sim World 3: Rail Head Treatment Train!

name: Totally Rad Metal Detector League
description: With nothing but the hum of your metal detector for company, explore in splendid isolation for that hidden treasure. Share that unique blend of tranquillity and anticipation with friends in online co-op - or dial up the intensity and race rivals to totally rad treasures in this metal detecting sim!

name: Train Sim World 3: Santa Fe F7 Add-On
description: Warbonnet beauty! An American legend with perhaps the most famous face in railroading history, reminisce in the stainless-steel days and take on the challenge of mastering steep grades aboard the Train Sim World 3: Santa Fe F7!

name: Vanquish
description: This is Vanquish! A top-down pixel art shooter where you play as either an Orc Warrior or a Gnome Magician which have both crashed onto a cursed island.

name: Virtual Sailor NG
description: Virtual Sailor NG is an open world sailing simulator with accurate physics, simulating well the various boats included. The game allows the user to modify and experiment with scenery making and vehicle design by way of extreme mod ability, with a large library of existing mods and add-ons.

name: WitchCraft TD
description: Open the ancient portal and defend the crystal from waves of mysterious enemies! As an apprentice witch your magic is quite random so you have to come up with some strategy to make the best out of your luck.

name: Wizards, Knights & Archers
description: Defend your townships Energy Orbs with your fellow AI helpers and your trusty pet against waves of invading fantasy creatures who home-in on your Orbs energy and want to take its power for themselves.

name: Word Attack
description: A board game which challenges you to form words from sets of letters. Play at your own pace or against the clock, on your own or against other players.

name: World Mahjong: Original
description: This board game is a mahjong game played by 4 people or computer.learn and play by this App about the Traditional Chinese Mahjong and Japan Riich Mahjong Game.

name: World of Motors 2
description: world of motors 2. A game tailored to your requirements. Multiplayer, Car modification, Compete with anyone else, Racing and Drifting with friends, Real world and real cars, Multiple maps, and Real multi cars.

name: Woten DX: Traveller's Dream
description: Woten DX: Traveller's Dream is a 2D puzzle-platformer imbued with the spirit of discovery! Dive headfirst into a rich and enchanting world full of charm, challenge and intrigue!

name: X8
description: A digital cataclysm has forced a reboot of all contemporary shooters. Heroes from different FPS franchises find themselves crossing paths back to their common ancestor game engine. They will compete to restore their source worlds and each rebuild their path home.

name: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Australia, Oceania, Pacific
description: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Australia, Oceania, Pacfic is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Oceania/Pacific Scenery.

name: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Europe
description: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Europe is a free DLC that you can activate through your Steam Client. It will give you the default Europe Scenery.

name: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: North America
description: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: North America is a free DLC that you can activate through your Steam Client. It will give you the default North America Scenery.

name: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: South America
description: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: South America is a free DLC that you can activate through your Steam Client. It will give you the default South America Scenery.

name: Xplorasi3d 2.0
description: 3D Digital Game-Based Learning.

name: X-Racer
description: "X-Racer" is a flying racing game in which players control an illusory plane and fly in an illusory space.

name: Yako
description: A 2D platformer mixing traditional animation, story-telling, and wind-powered abilities.

name: Yokai's Wish
description: Destroy all the plans to seize the world by these beautiful demons, because if you do not cope with them, they will terrorize our planet for thousands of years, gather all your will into a fist and give them a decisive resistance!

name: You Are the Dinner
description: "You Are The Dinner" is an immersive action rougelike game where you can feel the psychology of a young soldier trying to fulfill his duties in a city full of zombies and try to keep him alive. But it's no easy task with millions of zombies pouring in on you.

name: Zellige: The Tilemaker of Granada
description: Zellige : The Tilemaker of Granada is a meditative and relaxing historical game, set in medieval Al-Andalus, where you play as a skilled tilemaker and design intricate Islamic mosaic patterns to decorate a merchant family's palace. Let your creativity flow and create beautiful patterns !

name: ZI Survival
description: You are stranded in the vast expanse of the island. Alone, without any means to call for help, you must do what you can to survive. Explore The land as you hunt for supplies to craft the tools, weapons, and base you’ll need to stay alive. Stay Alive!

name: Zodiac Hentai: Hellish Memory
description: In this game you have to memorize the cards while surviving a real hell of bullets, with illustrations of beautiful sexy girls. Challenge your skill, your reflexes, your memory and dodge the shots to leave the girls as they came into the world.

name: Harvest Moon GBC
description: Harvest Moon GBC is a remaster of the Game Boy game Harvest Moon GB. It was released for the Game Boy Color by Natsume in North America and Nintendo in Europe. In the game, you'll take care of your farm within the in-game year. The game has Game Boy link support where you can trade items with other owners of the game. The game is viewed from a bird's eye perspective.

name: Night of The Full Moon: Memory in mirror
description: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her memories...

name: Zombie Age
description: Welcome in this defense-action game of Zombie Age. Now is the time to see you in action. Imagine that you are watching TV and you hear strange sounds from outside.

name: Zombie Arena
description: Zombie arena is a multiplayer first person shooter gamer, focused on cooperation to annihilate zombies and various monsters in a post apocalyptic world.

name: Zombie Hunter
description: Clean up a steady stream of infected zombies! Each pass, select a buff type to strengthen yourself, kill the super Boss to get a skill chest, a combination of strategic skill buffs, and match your output style. Each pass is an ultimate Roguelike experience!

name: Permanent Sleep
description: Permanent sleep is a roleplaying detective adventure game. Players will play the role of detective Kylin and police Jonas, and investigate the mysterious serial murders as well.

name: Arrogation: Unlight of Day
description: Arrogation: Unlight of Day brings you a mysterious exotic horror adventure. You will play as a lone reporter searching for his lost family in an abandoned village from 80s China. Beyond darkness, you will find nightmarish creatures and secrets from the long lost Imperial Japanese Army.

name: Qianling Mainland
description: This is a XianXia game with a high degree of freedom. You are an ordinary youth in the 21st century, one day you are accidentally forced from modern society to send Xianxia different world - Qianling mainland. From now on ordinary life ushered in a gorgeous turn!

name: Dreamed Away
description: A walking simulator in which you control a mentally ill hero. You must escape the "something'' you encounter and return to the original world as you know it. Explore the map while running away from "something" and find a way to escape.

name: Rounders
description: Are you a genius? Are you confident in your mind? Then join the genius game! The wonderful experience of wits should not be missed! The game tells the story of a frustrated man who was laid off by the company and inadvertently crossed into a different world.

name: Tales of TianYuan Dynasty
description: It is a martial arts fantasy RPG game.The world is so wide, you will choose to continue to raise the sword of chivalry on the journey, or stay away from the chaos and be alone. After the wind blows, how do you choose?

name: Maritime Hegemony
description: "Navigation Domination" is an RPG game with the 15th century era of great voyage as the background. Based on the 14th to 19th centuries, especially the world after the great geographical discovery and the opening of new routes, maps, ports, cities and specialties for trade are constructed.

name: Lady in tomb: Beneath the ocean
description: A first-person adventure game. The Story continues from Lady in Tomb. Gu Jiuxun became the new Gulady. But since then, she has stepped into the curse of "die before 30 years old". In order to save her, Hu Nian determined to find the immortal medicine in the undersea tomb where Xu Fu is buried.

name: West Fantasy
description: Western Fantasy is an independent game based on cowboys and post-modern science fiction. The story takes place in A.D2573, players will play the protagonist "River*Clint" and embark on exciting adventures in the overhead world called the western continent.

name: ElementForger
description: Element forger is a RogueLite mowing game with unique experience. The author is ingenious in this game in the integration of economic system and selection strategy. Players need to master the rhythm of the game to enjoy a good mowing experience. Look forward to your wonderful performance!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 2: Danger Mountain March 1- 3
description: Description: A new adventure in the Dia Earthlands, featuring three brand new quests! Kiesel and Lazuli take center stage as main characters! Just what kind of chaos unfolds as Lazuli undergoes a rigorous training regiment?

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Bonus Unit: Kiesel
description: Description: Adds Kiesel, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Bonus Unit: Lazuli
description: Description: Adds Lazuli, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Challenge Quest: Danger Mountain March EX
description: Description: Adds a bonus challenge quest featuring an enhanced version of the boss encounter from Danger Mountain March. This quest does not include any story content.

name: Battle Thunder Front: The Lost Red Sea
description: The background of the game is based on the fictional Red Sea War, and players can fight in the form of small teams or large units. The game also supports custom play mode configurations for combat.

name: Beat the Devil
description: Rocketman demon and his army have kidnapped Terzonators wife. So you need collect weapons destroy army and demon boss to resque your wife

name: Blaster
description: Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called Blaster

name: Casting Couch Simulator
description: Realtime 3D simulator of the popular adult genre! It's your turn to host a casting. Find out about her and how far is she willing to go to get a part.

name: Chivalry 2: King's Edition
description:
Chivalry 2 King's Edition includes exclusive in-game content. Chivalry 2 is a multiplayer first person slasher inspired by epic medieval movie battles.
Chivalry 2 King's Edition contains:
1. Chivalry 2 Special Edition
2. Rebel King's Armor and War Helmet
- Don the legendary armor worn by General Malric at the Battle of Stoneshill.
3. Feydrid's Aegis Armor and War Crown
- Fight for glory and honor with the Steward King Feydrid's royal set.
4. Duke's Talon and Kralle of Bridgetown Shields
- Protect yourself with the Duke's Talon (Mason Shield) and Kralle of Bridgetown (Agathian Shield).
5. Surrender Flag Novelty Item
- Live to fight another day with this novelty item, added to your spawn-in inventory.
6. 1000 Crowns + 5000 Gold
- Receive 1000 Crowns (premium currency) - and 5000 Gold (earnable currency), used to unlock new armor, weapon appearances and more!

name: Nanomon
description: Nanomon are tiny, virtual pets who hang out in the corner of your screen. Train, explore, discover, and play with your Nanomon so they can evolve into the perfect companion! Only the best, most attentive trainers will help their Nanomon achieve their life goal!

name: Code Red
description: Play Code Red for Free! A fast paced online arcade third-person shooter. Unlock the mystery of the enigmas and use chaotic abilities to gain the competitive edge.

name: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Burst Forth!! Choro-gon Breath: Director's Cut
description:
The official game of the hugely popular “Miss Kobayashi’s Dragon Maid” manga comes to Steam as a director’s cut that reflects the passion of the development team! Fly, shoot, and punch... send enemies flying right before your eyes!

The director's cut of Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Burst Forth!! Choro-gon Breath contains additional personified illustrations of stage bosses specially drawn by original author coolkyousinnjya, adjusted difficulty for each stage, and select between normal mode and director’s cut mode in-game.

name: A Simple Job
description: A tile based puzzle-ish game that uses the Playdate's crank control.

name: Speed Journey
description: Join this Speed Journey thorough the racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Dialogue
description: Dialogue is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named AI and it plays like a traditional fangame where the main goal is to collect effects (called "Props").

name: Ex.Emi
description: Ex.Emi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It plays like a traditional fangame where you play as Emi (笑美), a young woman who refuses to leave her apartment.

name: Shirube no Kazari
description: Shirube No Kazari is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You control Michito, who stays in an abandoned facility, keeping watch over a mysterious girl in a chamber. The game does not feature a traditional Nexus, but rather a linear starting area that branches out as the player explores further. There is also a health system wherein the player will be woken up if they're caught by chasers too many times.

name: Yume no Radio
description: Yume no Radio is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Kakutsuki and explore her dream world. The goal is to explore and collect effects (which are some objects that glow lights). A minigame called Shiwake is accessible by interacting with the device next to the notebook.

name: Yume Tsuduri
description: Yume Tsuduri is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame where you play as and explore Eritsuki's dream world. The goal is to explore and find effects.

name: Please Don't Litter
description: A PS1 style game where you have to collect garbage.

name: Candlehead
description: Explore a dark and eerie first person horror game where your doom flickers in the form of a candle barely visible through the dusky gloom.

name: Saint Kotar: The Ritual
description: This free DLC comes with a new playable character whom PC players might know as Viktoria. You can now finally delve into her side of the story and experience what happened the night before the start of the main game. Follow a woman battling her own demons in this brand-new storyline as she tries to get redemption by finding out what happened to her missing father.

name: Dandy Shot
description: Sin descripción

name: Yumiko in the Haunted Mansion
description: A maze-style ZX Spectrum title. Help Yumiko avoid ghosts, light the haunted mansion's candles, and rescue your parents across 32 stages before time runs out!

name: Metroid: Subzero
description: Metroid: Subzero is a short, 30 minute ROM-Hack first released in March 2020. Explore a handcrafted world with a unique design and some surprises.

name: Shinobu
description: Shinobu is a videogame made for Amstrad CPC using Z80 assembly and with the CPCtelera library. This project was highly related to optimize every piece of memory due to the Amstrad CPC limitation of 16KB of memory RAM.

name: Metroid: The Blue Plague
description: Explore an asteroid on a crash course with Earth, and find a way to destroy it. This asteroid has a dark past, however, and you will soon find that you are not alone... can you survive on it long enough to find its weak point and save our precious blue planet?

name: Neolithic First City-States
description: Neolithic: First City-States is a Historical Strategy Game. Though Neolithic doesn't fall easily into popular strategy genres, the game is heavily influenced by games such as Age of Empires, Civilization, Caesar III, and to a lesser extent games like RimWorld. The game includes aspects of City-Building, RTS-like gameplay and deeper characters. It is essentially a full-time solo dev project.

name: Shock Lobster
description:
Zip and zap your way to the top in this aquaventure!

Shock Lobster is a Game Boy ROM designed to run on the original Game Boy handheld video game system using a flash cartridge. It should also play well on most emulators.

name: Mini Kaizo Bros. 3
description: This is a progressive Mini kaizo hack with the “mini” representing level length. It starts off soft with some basics and progressively get harder. 7 worlds 47 levels and quick retries. Good luck and have fun!

name: Lords and Peasents
description: Lords & Peasants is a medieval real-time strategy and city building game developed by Inverted Cat Games. It has both single and multiplayer modes with up to 16 Players. Start out as a lord of a small village and develop it into a prospering city. Manage your city and rule over the peasants. Forge alliances and intimidate your enemies. Recruit an army and conquer the lands to create your kingdom.

name: Shovel Adventure
description:
You are Johnny Pallas, the legendary archeologist of Utrera. After your hardest researching job, you finally have found the mystery of the mysteries of ancient Egypt: the secret entrance to the Pharaom Lholha Flowers' chamber.

To get to the entrance, you have to enter in the big pyramid and found all the gems before the time is over. Only when you unearth all the gems, you can take the Ankh and the next chamber will be open.

40 chambers are waiting for you and your shovel before getting to the secret entrance... Are you ready to accept this challenge?

name: Kirikou
description: Kirikou is a 2001 platform video game based upon the 1998 French film Kirikou and the Sorceress.

name: Mushroom Kingdom: Under Crimson Skies
description:
The Mushroom Kingdom has been covered up by crimson magic, cast at the clouds. That magic made all of the kingdom's inhabitants turn into stone statues, except for Mario and Princess Peach. It's now up to Mario to find out the responsible for that, and to restore Mushroom Kingdom to its former state.

The adventure consists of exploring the land to find Power Stars, and with their powers, dispel the crimson magic, restore Nature's Equilibrium and save the Universe's Destiny, which's also menaced by the one troublemaker. However, that's not as simple as it seems.

As you progress through the game, more of the story is revealed, and complex event turnarounds happen as well.

name: Battleship
description:
Battleship is a 1993 video game based on the board game of the same name.

The object is to sink the opponent's entire fleet without them sinking the player's fleet first. In this updated version, both the player and the computer get extra firepower from military aircraft and support weapons. There are even scenarios that start a player off in a pre-played game that he must resume (and overcome a bleak scenario).

name: Garry's worst fear
description:
Garry's worst fear is a TopDown point and click, turn based fighting game.
through garry's eyes you must face his worst fears in his cochemard

name: Benjamin Blümchen: Das Große Zoofest
description: In this game you help Benjamin Blümchen, a friendly elephant known from the popular German children’s audio play series of the same name, and his friends Otto and Stella to prepare for the upcoming zoo festival over the course of 13 mini games.

name: Prison Architect: Undead
description: Undead brings a whole new scenario to Prison Architect: one where the only objective is to survive! With this new, spooky, expansion wardens will have to fight off the undead attacks to save their inmates and free the prison from an unprecedented catastrophe.

name: Train Simulator: Huddersfield Line - Manchester: Leeds Route
description: The challenging and stunning Pennines await in Train Simulator, with the new Huddersfield Line: Manchester - Leeds route!

name: Terror Time
description: "Terror Time" is a classic tower defense game in an unusual and bright setting. Defend the base and get upgrade points.

name: Dark Desire 4
description: This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Healthy Plane
description: Destroy the unhealthy foods! Avoid fat and sugar! Complete the levels, collect points and dominate the leaderboard!

name: Suffer the Night
description: The envelope is just the beginning. Burn it. Destroy it. Don't play his game. When you see the pale man, it’s already too late. Suffer The Night is a first-person survival horror experience.

name: Sokobear: Summer
description: Summer heat is on! Bear found a new season job serving coconut water. Visit 40 places in this charming forest neighbourhood and solve sokoban style puzzles to help Bear open the coconuts. Job done, enjoy some freshness!

name: Sokobear: Cave
description: Bear has a shiny new job! There are lots of caves inside this mine full of glowing rocks, and he must collect the precious stones. Help Bear in these sokoban-like puzzles. Plan your moves, break the crystals blocking your way! Gathering gems can get quite tricky.

name: Trafficker: 4th Generation Warfare
description: The trafficker character is a new character class that allows you to discreetly make all sorts of illicit transactions: buying weapons, military equipment or various objects, forging papers, informing about scandals, putting you in touch with illegals, ...

name: RCPG
description: RCPG is an arcade combat-racing game, where you drive remote controlled cars that speed through amazing tracks with combat abilities.

name: Far Cry 6: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Far Cry 6 Game of the Year Edition includes the base game, all Season Pass content, all game updates, the Ultimate Pack, and the new expansion, Lost Between Worlds (coming soon).

Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. The award-winning Far Cry 6 thrusts players into a modern-day guerrilla revolution. Become a guerrilla fighter and liberate Yara, in solo or co-op.

name: NASCAR 21: Ignition - Victory Edition
description:
Make the most of your racing experience with NASCAR 21: Ignition - Victory Edition; the best way to enjoy the thrill and excitement of the 2021 and 2022 NASCAR Cup Series seasons in one game. NASCAR 21: Ignition Victory Edition includes the base game of NASCAR 21: Ignition, the official video game of the world's most popular stock car racing series. Also included is Season Pass 1, which features three DLC packs of 2021 content (Throwback, Patriotic and Playoff schemes) and four Legendary NASCAR drivers, including NASCAR Hall of Fame driver Bill Elliott.

NASCAR Ignition Victory Edition also includes the 2022 Season Pass which will feature three DLC packs that contain additional alternative paint schemes from the historic 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season, including Throwback, Patriotic, and Playoff schemes.

name: Catan: Console Edition
description:
Play the official video game of Catan on Console! Acquire resources, master new strategies, and build your settlements across a board that comes to life. Challenge friends both online and in the living room or play against smart & dynamic AI to become the winning Catanian!

Charmed by opportunity and the promise of faraway riches, you and a collection of likeminded adventurers abandon your homeland and livelihoods to discover new lands. After a long and arduous journey, fraught with danger and difficulty, you arrive at the shores of a lush land, untouched by humanity, and abundant in resources.

See each tile come to life as you grow your settlements and take over the board. Gather ore from towering mountains, collect wool from bustling pastures, or harvest lumber from thriving forests. No two games are the same, with variables boards each game will feel, look, and play different!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Futanari Threesome
description: Challenging 6 by 6 jigsaw puzzles, featuring adult images of a couple and a futanari, having an erotic threesome.

name: Splash Jumper
description: Splash Jumper - miniature arcade clicker game about jumping on platforms. Each click is a jump. Your task is to jump and recruit points.

name: Splash Fly Fire
description: Flappy Fly Fire is a game in which you need to control fire. The game ends when the fire touches the dynamite and everything explodes.

name: Win the Diamond
description: Win The Diamond is a 3d side scroller action adventure sci-fi shooter game where there is a Diamond hidden somewhere in the level. The player needs to find the diamond and collect it, in order to win the diamond. But collecting it will not be an easy task.

name: Elimination Games
description: Play 'red light green light' with a creepy giant mechanical doll in the ultimate knockout elimination tournament! Reach the far wall without the doll catching you to win and progress to the next round.

name: Planet Crossword
description: The collaborative crossword game made for streaming and video conferencing

name: Dungeon Master
description: Dungeon Master is a unique 3-person action-adventure with a deep story. You have to go through a lot of trials to meet the one who abandoned you. Trust the one your heart is searching for. Choose what is more important to you: revenge or happiness...

name: Dream Football Club
description: Is the foreign soccer hand tour too tiring? And domestic cannot control too boring? "Football Dream Team"-Easy Control Strategy Competition! Realize the dream of football fans for many years!

name: Morrow
description:
Morrow is a time survival game combined with RPG elements.
Your goal is to survive the waves of enemies charging you, gaining levels and expanding your skillset to become stronger, while also searching for lost artifacts to progress within each level.

name: Animal Crossing-e
description: Animal Crossing-e came in four series and was released on the e-Reader in 2002 and 2003. Some of the cards contained minigames.

name: Domo-kun no Card-e
description: Domo-kun no Card-e is an e-Reader card released alongside Domo-Kun no Fushigi Terebi. When scanned, it would unlock a variety of mini games that were not available initially. Not much is known about the game.

name: Pikmin 2-e
description:
Pikmin 2-e was an e-Reader game that came in two series including Pikmin 2-e Collection Series 1 and Pikmin 2-e Collection Series 2. The games were released exclusively in Japan alongside the release of the Nintendo GameCube game Pikmin 2. In all, there are a total of sixty cards. Because the cards in each package aren't random, collecting all sixty cards won't prove to be a task. In all, there are 12 packs within the two series. In order to play the games, you'll need to have the e-Reader and Game Boy Advance connected to the GameCube. Once you do, the following games are available:

Hikkonuki Pikmin: In this game, you are tasked with getting all of the Pikmin stuck in the ground out by plucking them.
Tekuteku Pikmin: You'll take control of the Pikmin and get them to the end of the course.
Tsunagete Pikmin: You'll alter the positions of platforms to give the Pikmin access to the otherside of the arena.

name: Pokémon Battle-e
description:
Pokémon Battle-e were e-Reader card sets that was made to be used with Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire, and later Pokémon Colosseum, Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen, and Pokémon Emerald. The later sets were not released in America. When connected with the game, the player could receive extras such as new berries, and new trainers to battle.

Oddly, the Pokémon you battled through the trainer cards would not give your Pokémon any experience points or items after they were completed. When the player scans a berry card, you'll receive a berry from a character.

name: Tottoko Hamtaro Card-e
description: Hamtaro-e is an e-Reader video game released in 2003, exclusively in Japan. Not much is known about the game, though it's possible that it gives the player extra features in the Game Boy Advance Hamtaro games (much like Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e and Animal Crossing-e).

name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong e+
description: Mario vs. Donkey Kong e+ is an e-Reader Cards set released in 2004. There were five cards released, and they were only given to 1,000 people who competed in a competition in Japan. The game was not made available in America. Each card, when scanned, would give the player an extra level in the Game Boy Advance video game Mario vs. Donkey Kong. While there were 12 spaces available, Nintendo only released five levels. A sixth game (actually the first card to be released) wasn't available in this set.

description: Sin descripción

description: Game Boy Color port of International Superstar Soccer 2000.

description:
Need for Speed Unbound Palace Edition and get 3 days early access plus exclusive Palace branded content including:
- 4 stunningly intense new Custom Cars
- Palace Clothing Pack containing 20 items
- Palace Driving Effects
- Loads more bitz

name: Tahoe Dragon: The Beginning
description: They warned us in the 1980s, "You don't want to know what is down at the bottom of lake Tahoe." The year is 2042. And earthquake beneath the lake removed rocks from underwater tunnels that set the beast free.

name: Stickman's Arena
description: Stickman's Arena is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a stickman wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades and combine your weapons to create unique and game-breaking builds.

name: Jikkyou J.League Perfect Striker 5
description: Sin descripción

name: FireJumpers Inferno: Full Version Unlock
description: Unlock all features!

name: J.League Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3
description: The third installment in the J. League Jikkyou football/soccer series. As with the other games in the series, the game focuses entirely on Japanese soccer leagues and lets you choose a team and try your luck at various available cups, quick exhibition matches or leagues. All the expected gameplay elements of a soccer game are there, from various player moves and rules of the game to setting team formations and choosing teams to control and stadiums to play on. Live commentator is present, but doesn't comment on everything but only on key elements as well as addressing players by their actual names. Camera isn't fixed and adjusts during gameplay to best show the current action, switches to back view for free kicks and penalties, zooms out if the ball is too high to show both the kicker and the ball, and otherwise works as an action camera slightly rotating angles and using zoom automatically instead of just scrolling over the soccer field. Before engaging in a match with another player or the CPU, player can also do training with a selected team where only your team players are on the field where one can test all the moves and learn the ropes. Penalty kicks are also available for practice, but it includes two teams aiming to score five goals first.

name: Pokémon Polished Crystal
description:
An improved, polished version of Pokémon Crystal.

It fixes bugs, takes into account the official game changes since 2001, and adds some new ideas. Many features restore what was removed from R/B/Y, or original to HG/SS.

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 9
description: Franchise Hockey Manager 9 is the latest (2022) version of the Franchise Hockey Manager series. Releasing in October of 2022, FHM9 continues to build off of its previous versions and has added a variety of new features. Franchise Hockey Manager is the only NHL Licensed game on PC.

name: Haunted: Live
description: Haunted: Live is a game where you explore abandoned ruins far away from the city. They is a channel that has just begun to attract attention. They came here to do a broadcast introducing ghost stories related to this place along with the abandoned house experience.

name: Vari Dungeon
description: Explore infinite random dungeons with amazing retro pixel art graphics ! Find the best build by testing all the power-ups available, and don't forget to look for all the secrets !

name: Bunker Life
description: "Bunker Life" is a survival game to get through the Apocalypse. You need to explore various areas to obtain a new card. Acquire vehicles and expand your searchable range. Meet colleagues of various professions and join forces to survive.

name: Japanese Goblins
description: Charming fairy-tale heroes. Puzzle game.

name: Kawaii Solitaire 3 in 1
description: Enjoy a cute collection of three solitaire card games

name: Airport Flight Administrator Simulator & Air Traffic-Sky Airplane Sim Plane
description: Play the game and get to know what it feels like to be employed at an airport! In Airport Administrator Simulator you get the chance to experience the life of an airport employee. You will be responsible for taking care of the airport.

name: Black Widow: Looking for Love
description: It's impossible not to be eclipsed by a mysterious woman and, although she may not be trustworthy, her charms have piqued your interest and you want her to give you a chance. She wants to be sure that you are the right person for her.

name: My Life: Pet Vet
description: Take care of sick and injured animals in your own small animal practice. Use various examination techniques, make the right diagnosis and give your little patients the right treatment - just like a real-life vet.

name: Pixel Artist
description: Unleash your inner artist and create beautiful works of art. Choose a blank canvas from one of the 8 categories and paint by number. Fill your art gallery with over 100 paintings of different shapes and sizes.

name: Seduced in the Sleepless City
description: Editor of a woman’s magazine, you’re assigned to cover the grand opening of a new hotel and casino. In the party’s VIP room, you get up close and personal with a famous actor, a best-selling novelist, a charismatic plastic surgeon, and an F1 racer.

name: Rush Hour Deluxe: The ultimate traffic jam game!
description: Can you skilfully manoeuvre the red car out of the traffic jam? Slide the vehicles blocking it in their lanes forwards and backwards – until the road ahead is clear for the red car! Not only can you play Rush Hour Deluxe alone, but go head-to-head with your friends and family.

description: Super Dino is a fun puzzle game designed for kids as young as 2 years old! Higher levels of puzzle difficulties provide even more fun and challenges for children of all ages.

description: The Enhanced Edition provides various gameplay improvements and new story content. The game has players becoming a cat and exploring the world unknown with the magical camera that can copy and paste objects.

name: Super Funky Bowling
description: Put your thumbs to the test in a journey through 64 awesome handcrafted levels. Max out your skills and improve your times to be the very best! If you love action-based puzzle games, this could be right up your alley!

name: Solium Infernum
description: Solium Infernum is a challenging turn based strategy game based on the interaction of many simple concepts set in the profoundest depths of Hell.

name: Hakuouki Kyoukaroku
description:
PS Vita port of Hakuoki.

At a time when shogunate and imperial forces clashed for supremacy over Japan, Chizuru travels to Kyoto in search of her missing father. She runs into the Shinsengumi, a band of samurai warriors sworn to protect the shogun. Chizuru soon learns that they, too, are looking for her father. What awaits them is more than just your typical missing person’s case, as they face off against imperial soldiers and the supernatural! But in the midst of all this madness, will sweet and innocent Chizuru find love?

name: Piggy Gambit
description: Piggy Gambit is a game that harmoniously combines the elements of chess, box puzzles, and flow control into a coherent puzzle game about a piggy searching for the meaning to his life.

name: Vivamus in Fabula
description: Vivamus in Fabula is a short dark fantasy visual novel of around 1000 words, including a bonfire, medieval Irish art, dying people and relaxing music.

name: The Sinking City: Deluxe Edition
description:
Upgrade your experience with the Deluxe Edition which includes:

- The Sinking City game
- The Worshipers of the Necronomicon - 3 new quests in which Charles Reed investigates unsolved cases and sets out in search of mysterious spell books that harbor unspeakable powers.
- Merciful Madness - 3 new quests that explore Lovecraft’s iconic stories and bring to light the mysteries of Oakmont and its demented citizens.
- Investigator Pack - Upgrade your gaming experience with an exclusive private investigator outfit and access to a first aid kit, antipsychotics and a crafting materials starter pack.
- Chicago Organ Grinder - This DLC grants early access to the most powerful weapon in the game, the Tommy gun, and comes with a golden skin of the weapon.
- Experience Boost - This DLC includes a skill point that can be used from the start of the game. Use it wisely to upgrade your combat skills, vigor or mind.

name: J.League Winning Eleven 5
description: J.League Winning Eleven 5, released on October 25, 2001, was the first J.League entry on PlayStation 2. It was based on Winning Eleven 5. It was developed by KCET (Konami Computer Entertainment Tokyo) and published by Konami.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2
description:
The PlayStation port of World Soccer: Winning Eleven 6, released for PlayStation 2.

The game featured 54 international and 16 club teams (plus seven hidden ones) to participate in several tournaments, from friendship games to the World Cup, with a vast choice of customisable tournaments. Players can create their players with personal statistics, and then put them into any team. They can also play legendary teams, such as Brazil with Pelé or Argentina with Maradona.

name: J.League Winning Eleven 8: Asia Championship
description:
J.League Winning Eleven 8: Asia Championship is a Japan-exclusive football simulation game developed by Konami and released for the PlayStation 2 in 2004. This entry in the Winning Eleven series focuses on the J.League, featuring fully licensed teams and players from Japan's top-tier football league.

The game also includes clubs from across Asia, offering a broader regional competition experience. It incorporates the gameplay mechanics of Winning Eleven 8.

name: World Soccer: Winning Eleven 8 - Liveware Evolution
description:
World Soccer: Winning Eleven 8: Liveware Evolution is an enhanced version of Winning Eleven 8 developed by Konami and released exclusively in Japan in 2005 for the PlayStation 2. This edition introduced online multiplayer functionality, making it one of the first entries in the series to support online play.

It features updated team rosters, slight gameplay refinements, and the core mechanics of Winning Eleven 8.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 9
description:
PSP Port of Winning Eleven 9.

Pro Evolution Soccer 5 (known as World Soccer: Winning Eleven 9 in North America and Japan, sometimes mislabeled as World Soccer Winning Eleven 9 International) is a football video game developed and produced by Konami as part of the Pro Evolution Soccer series. With featuring Arsenal and Chelsea it is the first release of the series which offered fully licensed clubs from the Premier League, which is one of the 3 unlicensed leagues of the game. There are also 3 licensed leagues just like in the predecessor Pro Evolution Soccer 4. The game also includes 3 fully licensed leagues, which are the Spanish Liga Española, the Dutch Eredivisie and the Italian Serie A. As with previous versions, the game features an edit mode allowing the player to edit certain elements of the game. It was the last release to feature the German Bundesliga (in the game as German League) before it was replaced by a generic league because of losing the license for the following releases. Pro Evolution Soccer 5 marked the series' first appearance on the PSP. The game was also the first in the series to feature online play for the PlayStation 2. Within online play, statistics and league points are stored on the server for each game played. These points determine a team's (player's) position within the five online divisions.

name: J.League Winning Eleven 9: Asia Championship
description: J.League Winning Eleven 9: Asia Championship is a football simulation game developed by Konami, released exclusively for the PlayStation 2 in Japan in 2005. It features fully licensed teams and players from Japan's J.League, along with clubs from across Asia, offering a comprehensive regional tournament experience.
